mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(o.order_cd) FROM goods_order AS o
SELECT COUNT(o.order_cd) FROM goods_order AS o INNER JOIN facility_goods AS g ON o.facility_goods_cd = g.facility_goods_cd WHERE g.facility_cd = #{facilityCd}
SELECT * FROM goods_order AS o WHERE o.order_reg_date >= '2022-07-04' and o.order_reg_date <= '2022-07-18'

SELECT o.order_cd, o.user_id, o.facility_goods_cd, o.goods_ctg_cd, o.order_uuid_id, o.order_price, o.order_user_point, o.order_used_point, o.order_pay_price, o.order_reg_date, o.order_pay_state, o.pay_type, g.facility_cd, f.facility_nm, p.pay_method, p.pay_reg_date, pay_cd FROM pay AS p RIGHT join goods_order AS o on o.order_cd = p.order_cd INNER join facility_goods AS g on o.facility_goods_cd = g.facility_goods_cd INNER join facility AS f on g.facility_cd = f.facility_cd WHERE f.facility_cd = #{id} ORDER BY o.order_reg_date DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{rowPerPage};

SELECT o.order_cd ,o.user_id ,o.facility_goods_cd ,o.goods_ctg_cd ,o.order_price ,o.order_user_point ,o.order_used_point ,o.order_pay_price ,o.order_reg_date ,o.order_pay_state ,o.pay_type FROM goods_order AS o WHERE o.order_cd = #{orderCd} AND o.order_del_yn = 'N'

SELECT o.order_cd ,o.user_id ,o.facility_goods_cd ,o.order_uuid_id ,o.goods_ctg_cd ,o.order_price ,o.order_user_point ,o.order_used_point ,o.order_pay_price ,o.order_reg_date ,o.order_pay_state ,o.pay_type FROM goods_order AS o WHERE o.order_uuid_id = #{orderId} AND o.order_del_yn = 'N'

SELECT o.order_cd, o.user_id, o.facility_goods_cd, o.goods_ctg_cd, o.order_uuid_id, o.order_price, o.order_user_point, o.order_used_point, o.order_pay_price, o.order_reg_date, o.order_pay_state, o.pay_type, g.facility_cd, f.facility_nm, p.pay_method, p.pay_reg_date, pay_cd FROM pay AS p RIGHT join goods_order AS o on o.order_cd = p.order_cd INNER join facility_goods AS g on o.facility_goods_cd = g.facility_goods_cd INNER join facility AS f on g.facility_cd = f.facility_cd ORDER BY o.order_reg_date DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{rowPerPage};

SELECT o.order_cd ,o.user_id ,o.facility_goods_cd ,o.goods_ctg_cd ,o.order_price ,o.order_uuid_id ,o.order_user_point ,o.order_used_point ,o.order_pay_price ,DATE_FORMAT(o.order_reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS order_reg_date ,o.order_pay_state ,f.facility_nm ,f.facility_cd FROM facility AS f INNER join facility_goods AS g ON g.facility_cd = f.facility_cd INNER join goods_order AS o on g.facility_goods_cd = o.facility_goods_cd INNER join user AS u on o.user_id = u.user_id WHERE 1=1 AND o.user_id = #{userId} AND o.order_reg_date >= DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL- #{dateMonth} month) AND o.order_del_yn = 'N'
AND f.facility_nm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
ORDER BY o.order_reg_date DESC
SELECT COUNT(o.user_id) FROM goods_order AS o WHERE o.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT o.order_cd ,o.user_id ,o.facility_goods_cd ,o.goods_ctg_cd ,o.order_price ,o.order_user_point ,o.order_used_point ,o.order_pay_price ,o.order_reg_date ,o.order_pay_state ,g.sports_cd ,g.facility_cd ,g.user_id ,g.facility_goods_reg_date ,s.facility_stadium_nm ,s.facility_stadium_cd ,s.facility_stadium_detail ,f.facility_cd ,f.facility_nm ,f.facility_tell FROM goods_order AS o INNER join facility_goods AS g on o.facility_goods_cd = g.facility_goods_cd INNER join facility_stadium AS s on s.facility_goods_cd = g.facility_goods_cd INNER join facility AS f on f.facility_cd = s.facility_cd WHERE o.order_cd = #{orderCd} AND o.order_del_yn = 'N'

SELECT o.order_cd ,o.user_id ,o.facility_goods_cd ,o.goods_ctg_cd ,o.order_price ,o.order_user_point ,o.order_used_point ,o.order_pay_price ,o.order_reg_date ,o.order_pay_state ,g.sports_cd ,g.facility_cd ,g.user_id ,g.facility_goods_reg_date ,l.lesson_cd ,l.lesson_nm ,l.lesson_price ,l.lesson_detail ,f.facility_cd ,f.facility_nm ,f.facility_tell FROM goods_order AS o INNER join facility_goods AS g on o.facility_goods_cd = g.facility_goods_cd INNER join lesson AS l on l.facility_goods_cd = g.facility_goods_cd INNER join facility AS f on f.facility_cd = l.facility_cd WHERE o.order_cd = #{orderCd} AND o.order_del_yn = 'N'

SELECT o.order_cd ,o.user_id ,o.facility_goods_cd ,o.goods_ctg_cd ,o.order_price ,o.order_user_point ,o.order_used_point ,o.order_pay_price ,o.order_reg_date ,o.order_pay_state ,g.sports_cd ,g.facility_cd ,g.user_id ,g.facility_goods_reg_date ,p.pass_cd ,p.pass_nm ,p.pass_unit ,p.pass_price ,f.facility_cd ,f.facility_nm ,f.facility_tell FROM goods_order AS o INNER join facility_goods AS g on o.facility_goods_cd = g.facility_goods_cd INNER join facility_pass AS p on p.facility_goods_cd = g.facility_goods_cd INNER join facility AS f on f.facility_cd = p.facility_cd WHERE o.order_cd = #{orderCd} AND o.order_del_yn = 'N'

SELECT o.order_cd, o.user_id, o.facility_goods_cd, o.goods_ctg_cd, o.order_uuid_id, o.order_price, o.order_user_point, o.order_used_point, o.order_pay_price, o.order_reg_date, o.order_pay_state, o.pay_type, g.facility_cd, f.facility_nm, p.pay_method, p.pay_reg_date, pay_cd FROM pay AS p RIGHT join goods_order AS o on o.order_cd = p.order_cd INNER join facility_goods AS g on o.facility_goods_cd = g.facility_goods_cd INNER join facility AS f on g.facility_cd = f.facility_cd WHERE o.order_cd = #{orderCd}
